sentence: Scientists at the UK Centre for Ecology & Hydrology are using bees to monitor environmental changes by analyzing the pollen DNA found in honey.

sentence: Through the National Honey Monitoring Scheme, which began in 2018, researchers work with beekeepers across the UK to collect and archive honey samples.

sentence: These samples help identify plant species present near hives and track how they change over time due to shifting environmental conditions.

sentence: Bees act as 'remote samplers,' gathering data across wide areas in a cost-effective way.
